/features.order:
- free

- data

/features.name: features

/features/data.title: Own your data
/features/data.text: This is a tool, not a platform. Your data stays with you.
/features/data.name: data

/features/db.title: No database
/features/db.text: Only static files and folders, meaning your work is easily portable and archivable.
/features/db.name: db

/features/extendable.title: Extendable
/features/extendable.text: Easily create custom field types for project specific interfaces.
/features/extendable.name: extendable

/features/free.title: Free
/features/free.text: Culture wants to be free. No monthly hosting fees or billing to keep up with.
/features/free.name: free

/features/history.title: Infinite history
/features/history.text: Gone and biffed it? Revert to previous verisons of your site anytime.
/features/history.name: history

/features/offline.title: Offline first
/features/offline.text: No internet connection? No problem. Sync changes automatically when reconnecting.
/features/offline.name: offline

/features/opensource.title: Open source
/features/opensource.text: Developed using some of the best open source projects, and released as open source.
/features/opensource.name: opensource

/features/p2p.title: Peer-to-Peer
/features/p2p.text: Instead of being confined to a centralized platform, publish directly with [Dat](https://datproject.org).
/features/p2p.name: p2p

/features/simple.title: Beginner friendly
/features/simple.text: [Choo](https://choo.io) is the friendliest front-end framework, and is the basis for the Designs and Panel.
/features/simple.name: simple

/.title: Enoki
/.subtitle:
An experimental tool for self-publishing
on the peer-to-peer web
/.quote: It unfolds as you make it
/.name: content
